Welcome to Community Crag!

What is it?

  • The Social Media of Climbing Gyms, a place for climbers to share problems with one another.

What does it do?

  • Helps climbers find projects to work on!

  • Search by grade, star rating, and climb type.

  • Don't like a grade? CCrag averages the grade suggestions of all users

Why?

  • Targeted at the Purdue bouldering wall, the Community Crag really shines in small gyms where making add-ons is common.

Note:

  • The Community Crag is not affiliated with or supported by Purdue University in any way.
